Title: Pokémon: The Rise of Darkrai
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: James Carter Cathcart (script adaptation), Junichi Masuda (creator), Hideki Sonoda (screenplay), Ken Sugimori (creator), Satoshi Tajiri (creator)
Actors: Rica Matsumoto, Ikue Ôtani, Yûji Ueda, Megumi Toyoguchi
Plot: An idyllic town is thrown into chaos when two powerful Pokémon, Dialga and Palkia, cross paths and battle, distorting the dimensions of time and space. The only hope comes from Darkrai, a shadowy Pokémon shunned by the townsfolk.
